(AAS), we are a Business and Service 
 Management systems Developing 
 Company with a generating working experience. Our working eexperience is ignited by Research from which we base to Develop the Management Systems.
Our Expertise lies in Developing Management Systems for Business owners and Service providers and in the Networking of the Systems

Nursery Schools Management Systems 
 Primary Schools Management Systems 
 Nursery & Primary Management Systems 
 Secondary Schools Management Systems

 Tertiary Schools Management Systems

 Hospitals management Systems

We also do Technical Work like Repair of Computers and other Electronics, we have a Secretarial Bureau where we do Graphics Designing, Secretarial Work

The owners of the above Businesses and Services are our target customers, we approach them and engage with them about the challenges they are facing them we build a system that will solve that particular challenge. This is what makes Access special
